job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're looking for a GenAI Agent Development Intern to join our team and help create innovative, data-driven solutions. You'll collaborate with experienced engineers, work on real-world challenges, and grow your skills in the exciting space where AI meets cloud engineering., Our strength lies in connecting people, processes, and technology , with a strong track record in data integration, data management, and cloud engineering.
       Our clients span multiple industries-retail, media, telecom, finance, and more-and include brands such as Rituals, Body&Fit, HEMA, KNVB, Coolblue, FD Media, and others across the Netherlands and Europe.
       Key Responsibilities:
          + Design and develop GenAI-powered agents using Vertex AI and other GCP tools.
          + Collaborate with software engineers to build solutions that interact with structured internal data sources.
          + Contribute to the development of data pipelines that prepare and process data for AI models.
          + Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code (primarily in Python and/or Java).
          + Participate in code reviews, debugging, and knowledge-sharing sessions.
          + Document your work to ensure clarity and reproducibility across the team.
       What we are looking for
job_details.full_text:
Agent Developer

We're looking for a GenAI Agent Development Intern to join our team and help create innovative, data-driven solutions. You'll collaborate with experienced engineers, work on real-world challenges, and grow your skills in the exciting space where AI meets cloud engineering., Our strength lies in connecting people, processes, and technology , with a strong track record in data integration, data management, and cloud engineering.
       Our clients span multiple industries-retail, media, telecom, finance, and more-and include brands such as Rituals, Body&Fit, HEMA, KNVB, Coolblue, FD Media, and others across the Netherlands and Europe.
       Key Responsibilities:
          + Design and develop GenAI-powered agents using Vertex AI and other GCP tools.
          + Collaborate with software engineers to build solutions that interact with structured internal data sources.
          + Contribute to the development of data pipelines that prepare and process data for AI models.
          + Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code (primarily in Python and/or Java).
          + Participate in code reviews, debugging, and knowledge-sharing sessions.
          + Document your work to ensure clarity and reproducibility across the team.
       What we are looking for

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development of GenAI-powered agents using specific tools like Vertex AI and frameworks for interacting with data. The core responsibilities align with building and deploying AI-driven solutions, which is characteristic of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and development of AI models, specifically agents powered by Generative AI.

phrases: build solutions that interact with structured internal data sources
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code (primarily in Python and/or Java)
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the process of building applications, writing code, ensuring code quality, and maintaining documentation, which are core software development activities.

phrases: Contribute to the development of data pipelines that prepare and process data for AI models
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the development of data pipelines for preparing and processing data, which is a key aspect of data engineering.
These phrases indicate an understanding of the need to create solutions that address business needs and real-world problems.

phrases: using Vertex AI and other GCP tools
job_tasks.justification: Vertex AI and GCP tools are often used for deploying and managing AI models in production environments, aligning with MLOps practices.
